Reviews.Content: I rate it at a 2 because it turns off and i have a very hard time turning it back on again. Please note, i treat it with care, it is out of reach of children, never has it been dropped. I always have it in a case. Not sure if its a glich.

Reviews.Title: great tablet, but where are the updates to kit kat
Reviews.Author: phillip smith
Reviews.Content: this tablet is everything they say it is. clear beautiful screen, fast and easy to use. Yet its feb13 and i still have not been updated to kit kat. anyone else having this issue.??

Reviews.Title: Best 7" tablet for price
Reviews.Author: W. Dibble
Reviews.Content: While the Nexus 7 (2012) is now over a year old, the tablet is very powerful. Being a Nexus device makes it all the more tantalizing. If you like HTC's Sense, or Samsung's Touchwiz, that's good and all for you, but I prefer the clean Android experience. The stock Android interface makes it a fantastic bit 'o hardware out of the box, and the battery is in good shape. My mom's had hers a year now.Now for the bit that I like. I'm an Android modder at heart. I value devices that are as open as possible, and the Nexus 7 is a perfect device in that regards. You can compile your own Android flavors easily for it, or download just about any ROM on the market. Furthermore, that makes it perfect for developing apps as well.The bad? Well, no rear-view camera, and that's about it. To be fair, I almost NEVER use the rear-facing camera on my Nexus 10, but being able to use it for photosphere would be nice.

Reviews.Title: best tablet on the market
Reviews.Author: karyn wilson
Reviews.Content: I love my Nexus. I use it 24/7 literally. The app market is great, the tablet runs multiple apps at a time without slowing or freezing, it is easy to transfer extra files to a computer to free up storage or to import files, the speaker is nice & loud, & I have never completely filled my storage space even after I downloaded an extensive music collection, books, apps, and pictures. The camera is nice but I wish it was on the backside. I was able to use it to take video during a flight for my mother & it turned out nice but obviously not as good as a digital camera. There are many free apps to choose from on the market. If you are looking for a few starter apps to try I reccomend chef tap (recipes), bulba the cat (game), duolingo (teaches Spanish) & season zen HD (wallpaper).

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet!
Reviews.Author: JHaveman
Reviews.Content: This 7 inch tablet has been a lifesaver. Its very portable, and at the same time is much more effective and convenient than a smartphone. The tablet is well built and functions smoothly. Software is upgradeable to the new 4.3 kitkat OS and runs it well. The only disadvantage I have found is that I wish I could get more life out of the battery.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I chose this tablet.  The screen is sharp.  It was a good price and it immediately updated to the newest Android version.

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet
Reviews.Author: Lena Carlson
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I wanted to try something different from my iPad 2, which I still love. The Nexus can do things the iPad can't like native floating video, floating browsers, emulators, some better apps like trackers (music making software). The only thing I don't like is the storage space. I rooted my Nexus just to be able to transfer freely between my external hard drive and the tablet, and somehow that messed up its ability to read the hard drive at all. One thing I really liked was that the model I bought let me plug in my Wacom Bamboo Fun Pen & Touch to draw in Sketchbook Pro.

Reviews.Title: Late review
Reviews.Author: James Kight
Reviews.Content: Bought this one a while back, just didn't write the review.One small complaint is the lack of auto rotate. Not really a big deal, because there's an app on google play that will allow this tablet to rotate, just seem like it should have been already on the tab.My wife uses this thing daily, posting to FB, reading email and what not, she loves it. Fast enough to do everything she wants, and with the built in 32gbs she has tons of room left.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need in a tablet, not quite as fast as the new 2013 version, but this is very affordable and can run any app that I've come across.

Reviews.Title: ASUS Google nexus
Reviews.Author: Brian "LabRat"
Reviews.Content: Love this product. Runs great. Tried using to replace kindle, but in the end it can't beat the e-ink, the screen still hurts my eyes. Great also to keep the kids busy. I utilize it instead of my laptop where ever possible.

Reviews.Title: Fantasticly Wonderful
Reviews.Author: mike mcconnell
Reviews.Content: It is just what the doctor ordered. I had a Nextbook tab and it was locking up more than anything else. My new Nexus 7 has cured me of all the headaches I was having and so much more. Download speeds are great and the graphics unbeaten. To say I love it would be an understatement. Thanks Asus! Another job well done...

Reviews.Title: just the right size.
Reviews.Author: carla weaver
Reviews.Content: I am still learning what my new tablet can do.  It appears to work great and is a lot of fun.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TABLET!
Reviews.Author: pamala
Reviews.Content: MY HUBBY LOVES THIS TABLET! I WAS WORRIED ABOUT IT BECAUSE OF THE PRICE BEING SO LOW..... NO PROBLEM, HE LOVES HIS NEW TABLET, WORKS GREAT!

Reviews.Title: best tablet
Reviews.Author: diegov
Reviews.Content: i mainly use it for browsing the internet, gaming and listing to music. the occasional book here and there. i have no complaints the tablet runs perfect, never forces closes and i always get the latest Google updates. (perks of having a Google direct device)

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Duffy
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Nexus 7. It is versatile, fast, easy to use, and does everything that I can do on my laptop. Not only have I recommended them to friends, I have also helped my friend  set theirs up after purchase. the set up is very easy, I just wanted to show them my favorite apps, Exedra

Reviews.Title: Christmas
Reviews.Author: peggy Russell
Reviews.Content: I bought the Nexus for my husband. My son said it was the best tablet on the market for the best price.My husband loves it. We are retired now and getting used to all these new tablets.What a deal! I love my Kindle. Read all the books I want. I love to read. Never had the change teaching school for all those years.Thanks, Peggy Russell - pegrus36@gmail.com

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Daniel G Tomaka
Reviews.Content: Very good tab. Can perform many functions. Tab is small enough to carry around and the screen is easy to see and has a very good resolution for watching movies or playing games. 32 gigs allow you to store a lot of apps. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described.
Reviews.Author: Aaron Godwin
Reviews.Content: I am happy with it. It's not too big, not too small, & full of functionality. I would recommend this to anybody looking to step into the tablet market. It is a great starter though personally I'm happy with staying with this model for a long time.

Reviews.Title: A very good tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this one for my wife as I had the 16gb and really liked it.  She has used her's for almost a month and really likes it.  The Kindle Fire might suffice, but,  it does not have the thousands of apps available to it.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Thomas Stone
Reviews.Content: I like this tablet more than most but when I am on firefox and I am trying to navigate online courses or claim unemployment, it will not register my finger selecting the options I want. Then it opens up another tab for no reason. other than that, I like it for the other things it has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Ok!
Reviews.Author: Dave Cordes
Reviews.Content: I had this for over a year now and its OK. Its handy and useful and below are the pros and cons I have with this device.Pros:1. High responsive touch.2. Looks amazing.3. Can survive rough use.4. No lag.Cons:1.  Weak wifi antenna: On a same wifi network my Samsung note 2 shows full network whereas in nexus 7 it will show only 50%2.  Battery: Battery backup is fair 5-6 hours on moderate brightness and 2-3 hours while playing high end games.3. Speaker and camera: speaker is not up to the mark, and there should have been a rear camera to take pictures

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Kelly Marion
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet I have never had any problems with this tablet. I love the perfect size and that it is a android the plus is that it isnt super expensive.

Reviews.Title: Good small tablet
Reviews.Author: L. Powell "geekgoddess"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this on a whim in December 2013 through Groupon.  I got a good deal!  So far it has preformed quite well.  It updated itself to the latest 4.4 version of android within a very short time of owning it.  It is pretty speedy and although I don't use it every day it has been performing well.  I would recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: Carlos Franco
Reviews.Content: The nexus 7 is a powerhouse I knew this when I bought it. It has a 1.2ghz tegra 3 quad-core, 1gb of ram, and up to 32gb of storage. It does have a front facing camera but to be honest I'm not a fan of that my GS3 has a better front cam and the other thing I don't like is that the memory isn't expandable, I would've liked to add a SD card but it's not an option. Those may seem like big faults that would require a lower rating but this tegra 3 quad-core is super smooth even better than my friends iPad 3 so for that alone I still give it 5 stars super awesome tablet!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: D. Delisle-mccartney
Reviews.Content: Great tablet at a reasonable price.  I love it.  Great for e-mails, games, reading, calling, watching movies etc.. provided you can connect to a router.  A true quality product.

Reviews.Title: bad product without a reasonable life span
Reviews.Author: Sergio Viana
Reviews.Content: The life of the tablet did not reach one year.  Now is dead after 8 month of use.The touch screen does not have good sensitity and the plug to connect the tablet and charge the battery is weak, so after 5 month of use started the problems to keep the conection and charge the battery.Too slow to start up.The updates of the operative system did not work well. After every update, the operation became more slow and the settings were changed without notice.The technical support is not good (at least out of USA). Some European countries do not have any service centerDid not have frontal camera

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet under 200 dollars
Reviews.Author: AmazonReviewer
Reviews.Content: I love this Tablet!! It is very portable, light and Fast. The games are very HQ and it is nice for reading books as well. This fitted my needs Perfectly.ProLightPortableSmallCheapConsNo front facing camera(The 2013 Nexus 7 has 1)Doesn't take micro sd cardNo very high quality CameraBattery Life

Reviews.Title: Amazon is best place to shop.
Reviews.Author: seuwema
Reviews.Content: I recommend this tablet to everyone who needs one. very amazing.  I received it as promised by amazon. great tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it....
Reviews.Author: Tina Cotto
Reviews.Content: My kids take it everywhere we go. They love it.. It truly has made trips alot more easier. lol Thank goodness for these tablets

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS THING!!
Reviews.Author: Hali Burley Price
Reviews.Content: I could not afford the iPad etc. so I found out about the Google Nexus 7. It was a great price, so I ordered it and in fact, ordered one for my husband, too. Merry Xmas, Honey!We do not have cable or regular TV service, but we have internet and wi-fi. It is the perfect device to carry around with you - to listen to music, to read email, to check Facebook. Awesome.The best thing of all is that my teenage tech wizard son downloaded all my favorite tunes into a playlist. With a very inexpensive gadget from Radio Shack, I can play MY music, all the time with no commercials, in my car through the Tape Deck (who uses real tapes ever? Not me.) I was so frustrated by our crappy local radio stations and again, I am too poor to afford iPods etc. This is so great. The 7 inches factor makes it truly portable - in my purse!I love this machine. It has changed our lives. My husband can sit right next to me while I am sewing or reading and he is watching rap music videos, or police car chases - his other favorite. That kind of noisy video sound in the house puts me on edge. It makes him so happy, I like to watch him watching his favorite videos.The machine is sleek and light. We got cases for the outside, which makes it protected and more safely portable. The plugs and recharging ability make it super convenient. If you are low budget like me, you should get this thing. It is probably BETTER than the i-Paid too much products. :-)

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: kimberly&charles
Reviews.Content: Its a great item works great to my son love it and I will get another one soon thank you

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet I Have Ever Purchased
Reviews.Author: ShinobiChris
Reviews.Content: After owning an iPad 2, an ASUS Transformer, Galaxy 2. 7", and a Kindle Fire, I can safely  say that the Nexus 7 outshines them all. The Nvidia Tegra processor makes gaming a lot of fun on even a 7" display. Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas plays better and loads faster on my Asus Google Nexus 7 than it did on my PC, PS2, or XBOX did at the time of the game's release. I find myself using this tablet more often than I do my game consoles or PC lately. Though the resolution is not 1080p like the newer model, it is still very modern and very functional. I hear a lot of people complain about only having the one forward facing camera and wishing it came with a high end rear facing camera as well. To them, I say: "Stop taking selfies with your tablet and invest in a really nice digital camera and the USB host adapter for your Nexus 7."

Reviews.Title: Liking it!
Reviews.Author: Susan L Herman
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because this seems to be a little more difficult to use than it should be. Maybe with more use, it will get better.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7 Tablet
Reviews.Author: jpills
Reviews.Content: I have downloaded the one thing I most wanted this for and am enjoying using it very much.  I can't wait to try some other things, too!

Reviews.Title: do not drop it
Reviews.Author: Ramon Almonte "Ray NYC"
Reviews.Content: once the screen cracks, you will have to buy a new one. It is a nice device but too delicate. The screen although can be replaced, there is not warranty that it will work.

Reviews.Title: Google and Asus
Reviews.Author: Chris Hopkins
Reviews.Content: Who wouldn't love a tablet built by Asus and Google. Great reviews on the net for the product and priced low for being a 32 gig unit.

Reviews.Title: Wishing it had come with a stylus
Reviews.Author: Desidunebuggy
Reviews.Content: It's o.k. The color is not that great compared to my Samsung Galaxy S4, but didn't expect it to be spectacular for the price and the fact that it's a first generation tablet. Just wish it had come with a stylus

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted for FB  & games
Reviews.Author: Laury J Schuetz
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet mainly for FB and FB games and it is perfect! The images are crystal clear, so clear, I'm shocked actually.  I'm sure it does so much more than I'm using it for, I just haven't had the time to explore everything it will do. I've also downloaded games from the app store and I have had no issues whatsoever playing anything. I've downloaded Skype and have used it successfully. I haven't owned any other tablets but as far as I'm concerned, this was money well spent!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Bethel Reinhard
Reviews.Content: The Nexus was a hit with my 11 yr. old granddaughter this Christmas. She never put it down during our week i

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I use my tablet every day and carry it with me as it fits in my purse.  I would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Love it. i have one and bought one as Christmas gift!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: User friendly!! Love it. Does everything I need and more. Transferred all my Kindle books, check facebook, email, and googles directions while I'm driving with me just asking by voice! And I am not tech savvy so is perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Yegor Shabanov
Reviews.Content: Great tablet, Horrible button positions. Terrible Speaker sound at first.But it seems to have fixed it self lately.Only reason for 4 stars is ergonomics of the device needs a little work.

Reviews.Title: ASUS Google Nexus 7, 7-Inch, 32GB, Tablet, 2012
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Got this for my granddaughter for a Christmas present. I am sure she will really like it. I am please with my purchase and am possibly thinking of getting one for myself a little later on. Will definitely be the 32GB.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Craig S.
Reviews.Content: Ease of use, quality, price. Bought just for gaming and reading e-mail. I use my laptop for everything else. Try it you'll like it!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Tracey Lindsey
Reviews.Content: Great product. Very nice screen. Speed and connectivity is nice. Weight and screen size are perfect. It's easy to carry

Reviews.Title: shoulda, coulda, woulda...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First off gotta admit I misread the specs so was ticked off with myself when I realized there was no storage slot (especially since l could almost swear a 32 GB SD card was "suggested" as a complementary purchase... but probably confused it with another tablet...) Then of course the 2013 Nexus was announced the day after mine arrived ...The tablet works OK and is used mostly in bed when I don't have my laptop on. Works great as a Kindle reader and is definitely more manageable than the 10" Toshiba Thrive it replaced (I seem to have a knack for buying (soon-to-be) obsolete tech...).  Even watched a few Netflix VODs without problems but there's a 32 inch TV three feet from the bed so prefer to use it.  Don't play many games and the lower resolution makes a few look screwy but that's not a big issue for me.My primary reason for writing this is to ask others if the sound volume on the speakers is as low (as in barely audible even with a volume booster app) as mine or did I get a defective set?  Even with jack or Bluetooth headphones it's still too low, and I usually set speaker volume to low to mid range.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: clinton
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best thing I own. Had it for nearly 2 years, iv dropped it, stepped on it, etc it still works perfectly. I spend about 2-3 hours a day on it and if it was to break today I would get another one tomorrow without a second thought.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: J. Bailey
Reviews.Content: Battery life very good, and recharges quickly. Size is perfect for what I want to use it for. Very good value.

Reviews.Title: great tablet and fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Donna Canzoneri
Reviews.Content: Everything went smooth and love my new tabletGot my order way quicker then I expected and use my tablet daily

Reviews.Title: IC, NY
Reviews.Author: VC
Reviews.Content: Excellent product to give a student for the holidays,something that can help them with classes and lectures.It came highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive tablet
Reviews.Author: gazatong
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this, only issue is a little bit of screen flickering at low light levels. Note that this is considered a mobile device for many applications, not a computer.

Reviews.Title: Nexus is a great buy
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: My kids love their Nexus', and I like that fact that it runs straight Android and we get updates faster then anyone else. As for the hardware, it runs everything (mostly games) the kids throw at it, the screen looks great (though I highly recommend getting an anti-glare screen protector...the screen is shiny), nothing bad to say about it really

Reviews.Title: it could be perfect, 2013 model will be nice.
Reviews.Author: botchok
Reviews.Content: it could be a five stars if only has a back camera, otherwise....go for the 2013 model or live with the 2012 model.

Reviews.Title: My kids love it!
Reviews.Author: Rafael Liriano
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't want to write a long review. This tablet was a landmark for Google. It has great specs for such a low price. I purchased it for my kids and they love it. What else can I ask for?

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet!
Reviews.Author: Janna Vance
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet and a great price point. I wanted something that was small enough to carry around, but also big enough to easily be able to view websites, read books on the Kindle app, etc. This is a great solution!

Reviews.Title: Was Rad while it lasted...
Reviews.Author: SoBeRyGuy "SoBeRyGuy"
Reviews.Content: It was super Rad until my wife decided to take it out of the case to clean the screen, and decided to leave it sitting on the table to charge and my kids knocked it off the table and cracked the screen... now it's going to cost ~$90.00 to buy the replacement parts, or pay ~$130.00 to have the Screen guy fix it for me... I guess that I should have payed for the drop-spill insurance...

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, good price
Reviews.Author: rdkeith
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet, I love it! This is the older (pre-2013) model but it's plenty fast and has a beautiful clear display. I opted for the 32MB version thinking I would want the extra memory but after using it I think most people (including me) would be fine with 16MB. I have seen and tried several somewhat cheaper tablets but none come even close to this in screen display and performance, especially for the price. I've seen some negative reviews but I've never had any complaint with it. I keep a cover on it and have dropped it several times on hard floors (read that as concrete) but never a problem. Battery life is great also, even with WiFi on all the time. I am very pleased with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for anything you want to do
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for a great price compared to the competition. It runs great and plays games and netflix flawlessly. The only complaint is it felt like the body was a little flimsy on the corners, I could hear it creak when I would move my hand. I would buy another one of these for my wife in a instant.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Jose Maria Iturreria
Reviews.Content: Excelent product! Works very well.Only thing I see as drawback is that wifi conections require you to be closer to the router than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Shripanzee "Shrimp"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for me. Works great! It's clear & bright, playing Candy Crush is great on this tablet with the high resolution screen and hd output!

Reviews.Title: My New Nexus 7 (2012) 32gb
Reviews.Author: sonia
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Nexus 7 2013 and thought it would be cool to own the Nexus 7 2012 version also, both are amazing products! Even with the Nexus 7 2012 only having 1gig of ram it still run fast!  I have been enjoying my Nexus products and highly recommend this particular size because it's not too big or too small.  I can honestly say, I do not like one more than the other... I LOVE THEM BOTH!CHEERS!!

Reviews.Title: Ok. Wouldn't buy again
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: it was great for the first few months and then less then a year later it just stopped working.  it wouldn't hold a charge despite using other cords and wouldn't work even when it was plugged in.  I ended up buying another tablet of a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Not reliable
Reviews.Author: MonkeyFighter
Reviews.Content: This is my second Nexus 7. The first one stopped working after about a year. If these tablets were a little more reliable, I would have given it a higher rating.

Reviews.Title: Lot of power in a little package
Reviews.Author: Matt Deller
Reviews.Content: I got this 1st gen nexus 7 right before the 2nd gen came out when they dropped the price.  It is worth every penny especially as a gaming platform for my kids they now use this more than their Nintendo 3DS.

Reviews.Title: great for reading.
Reviews.Author: W. Kreisler
Reviews.Content: good for reading.good weight and easy page turning. internet is slow and signal seems weak when rating it against my Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Useful across multiple platforms, this device delivers what I need.
Reviews.Author: michaelfarris10
Reviews.Content: This was a marvelous purchase. As a traveler, sometimes I need speed and function simultaneously, and I get it with this device. I particularly enjoy Keep, which has proven to be very functional -- and useful in sharing notes across platforms.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this tablet
Reviews.Author: Joey W.
Reviews.Content: Great tablet overall.  Seems to slow down significantly if you add another user profile.  Battery life is sufficient.  Nexus products don't have expandable storage, so know that in advance.

Reviews.Title: Fast and nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Zully Parra
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it and it has everything we were looking for. It is fast and the display is sharp.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect
Reviews.Author: Princess D
Reviews.Content: Brand New Google pad works perfect, kids love it price was great also. Didn't like the new version..... not much different then older model just less memory for about same price.

Reviews.Title: Lots of power for the price
Reviews.Author: Jon E. Szostak II
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my two kids for games and movies on a long plane ride overseas. I now find myself using it all the time. I rarely turn on my laptop anymore. Light, versatile, compact and beautiful picture. Get one!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: KIM AALTONEN
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money for kids' browsing, gaming! All the best of Android without unnecessary costly add-ons. Proper camera could have been a nice bonus, but they already added that in the newer version.

Reviews.Title: Its working well for me
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I like the variety of things that I can do with it and also reading my eBooks on it.  Its easy to handle, clear to read and fast.My husband has more recently bought one too- he ended up getting the newer version of this same tablet but I still stand by the one I ordered.  Would I order this one if I had to choose all over again?  Definitely!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Sejal Pandya
Reviews.Content: I have been using iPad (all versions), being iOS app developer love using iPhone & iPad. I have lenovo android device bought couple of years back for my kid so compared them unconsciously and found apple devices much better. This device has change my mind, this is an awesome device comes at half price.This got delivered on time, in fact day before estimated, properly packed. 5stars product and delivery

Reviews.Title: Fits in a cargo pocket and does everything I need it to do.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I own an ipad, a windows phone and a netbook and this fills in the gaps between them all, the ipad's great for around the house and the window's phone is my music player and gps but to play games and watch movies on the go the Nexus 7 is perfect. The app store offers a lineup that's comparable to the Apple and is light years ahead of the windows phone app store. I was trying to find one tablet or phone that fit all my needs but I guess that wasn't going to happen, the Nexus 7 fills in a lot of the blanks.

Reviews.Title: not enough information
Reviews.Author: Marina Nisnevitch
Reviews.Content: unfortunately it wasn't pointed that there's no rear camera, and i was really dissapointed to realize this fact when opening the pack

Reviews.Title: ASUS NEXUS 7 TAB LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Hope Trujillo
Reviews.Content: The tab is light weight and easy to hold in my hand.  My hands have arthritis and painful at times but this is light enough to hold for short periods of time.

Reviews.Title: ASUS
Reviews.Author: J. Renfro
Reviews.Content: I like parts of the Nexus 7 maybe I should have read more reviews or waited for the newer one even if it cost more.

Reviews.Title: My tablet it's broken!
Reviews.Author: Federico De Sousa
Reviews.Content: My tablet have the touchscreen broken, i dont know how that happen i only know one day y turn on and discover one black vertical line on the middle of the screen. I WANT MY MONNEY BACK!!

Reviews.Title: ASUS TECH ISSUES w/upate
Reviews.Author: matt c
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Nexus 7 last year for Christmas.  Now, less then 1 year later I am having the same Battery Problems that other customers have stated.  The tablet will not charge which makes for a dead tablet.  I have not contact Asus yet -- but it seems that this is a common problem which leads me to believe I will pay too much to get it fixed... we'll see.there is no way I can rate this anything but a 2 -- overall it's a tablet, but if it doesn't last, what's the point?  disappointing.Above was written 10/20/13 -- i mailed the nexus and received it on 11/6.  the memory was wiped (expected).  i plugged the nexus in to charge and it won't.  also, it seems that wifi connection is much weaker -- i tried to use it in another room and would not pick up the signal.. so now the battery/charger still does not work and now i have wifi issues.  what next? i received a survey from ASUS prior to receiving the item -- i am glad i waited a little bit to fill it out.  they asked if i would buy or recommend asus products -- honestly, there's no way.  if your products don't last and you can't fix them, or when you try you do more damage -- why would i trust any other products?  as for recommendations?  yes, i'll give you a recommendation for asus -- i recommend buying another brand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice!
Reviews.Author: anserrad
Reviews.Content: I have been an ipad user for years but when I got this tablet for my daughter I fell in love with it!  It allows for google apps to run smoothly (which doesn't happen in an ipad), that is the main appeal as her school works on a google platform.  She uses it for school work, reading, projects and leisure.  We love the size too.  Its an awesome tablet!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for a Fair Price
Reviews.Author: SHM
Reviews.Content: This is actually the second Nexus 7 we own.  We received the first one as a gift last Christmas and my wife uses it everyday.  Since receiving it, it accompanies her everywhere.  In the past year, I've grown accustomed to having it around also and decided to purchase my wife a new one and I took over the old one.  I must admit it is quite handy to check emails and Internet without the burden of a heavy laptop but just big enough to be able to read without trying to strain your eyes to look at a cell phone screen.  I like the Android system and plenty of apps available.  I also like the glass screen to prevent damage and not having any need for protectors.  It's got a 32GB hard drive which is plenty for our use.  If you want all the bells and whistles as some have, you going to have to pay for it!  For the price, this a winner!

Reviews.Title: tried the ipad mini first; this is better
Reviews.Author: some guy in Missouri
Reviews.Content: the Nexus 7 sees a dozen wifi networks in the exact same spot where the ipad mini struggled to see one or two.  I think the screen looks sharper and brighter on the Nexus as well.  Im still learning Android, but so far I cant see that it is clearly inferior or clearly superior to iOS 7.  I also have yet to try out the 4G feature; shopping data plans.  This tablet is great!

Reviews.Title: best deal
Reviews.Author: michael lipchock
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet, for under 200 you could not go wrong, don't waste your money on those I devices.Michael lipchock

Reviews.Title: Asus 7
Reviews.Author: Yao
Reviews.Content: I just got thid a month ago, doed what it sez.......and more.  Need more time to discover all that it does, lighting good for reading, fast response, plus price 160.00 bucks for 32 gigs, lol!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: Came exactly as described! No problems at all. The system is droid which took some getting used to but it is a fabulous tablet. Perfect size and has everything I need !

Reviews.Title: best tablet out there (until the New Nexus 7 apeared)
Reviews.Author: Matias Bongardt
Reviews.Content: it is a great product, light, tight and with and outstanding performance.the combination between the always reliable Asus technology and the Google's Android jelly bean OS makes the Nexus 7 (both generations) the best tablet in the market.

Reviews.Title: great tablet but battery life should be better
Reviews.Author: Varune
Reviews.Content: this really is a good budget tablet if u plan on playing alot of hd games along with normal tablet function. i bought this along with a memo pad and the memo pad is almost as good except in the graphics department. everything else is basically on par. ease of operation, smoothness and screen quality. the memo pad has better battery life though

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: R. Baker
Reviews.Content: This has lived up to it's reviews by others.  A friend who has had one since they first came out recommended it and he was right on.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Rostad
Reviews.Content: I love my Google nexus 7! I am on it every day! The battery life is amazing, I can go all day without charging and I play a lot of games!!! Get it you will love it!

Reviews.Title: good item
Reviews.Author: Luokun Xie
Reviews.Content: The tablet is designed nicely. It respond fast. Apps are good and abundant. Nice one! I bought it for my niece and she likes it very much.

Reviews.Title: Really like it, but it's hard to do it.
Reviews.Author: Esteban Roman "RogueJ"
Reviews.Content: I really really forced myself to like this tablet, as it is made in partership with Google, it gets the latest android updates, even on the launch day. It's light, have many accesories, easy to handle and understand it. But (and this is a big but), it has many hardware issues that I didn't look up in the internet before, and I almost have them suffered all of them, nevertheless it's a great tablet and if you have a little patience all those issues have solutions and can overcome them.I've been using it for about 5 months.Pros- Very long autonomy, I have use it with video and wifi over 7 straight hours (4325 mAh battery). Even the new Nexus 7 doesn't have this battery.- Fast updates, you don't see this in Samsung, Sony or other tablets, as the updates are "filtered" through these companies.- Light 340 grams- Good screen resolution 1280 x 800- Easy to understand.- Many accesories found here at Amazon.Cons- Issues regarding internal battery connectors, won't charge or hold charge.OverallIt is a great tablet, had to return it to Amazon because it wouldn't hold the battery charge after the first weekend charging, there was a solution found in some blogs and youtube, but I mean it was a brand new tablet. So, I returned it and got my money back. Bought it with a local retailer and been using it since without any problems.It seems a little late for my review as the new Nexus 7 has been launched. I won't buy the new one and will probably wait for the next edition.

Reviews.Title: A good deal
Reviews.Author: Edgar
Reviews.Content: Except for a small crack in the display, which I didn't even notice, until outdoors and sunlight reflected on the display causing a small rainbow to appear.Arrived as scheduled.Price was right.Yes I would buy from them again, no problem

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7" Tablet/32 gig
Reviews.Author: David F. Garcia
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what I wanted it to do. It is quick and very portable, The screen is clear and the software is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "veilance"
Reviews.Content: I have 2 regrets about buying this Nexus 7 when I did:1) I didn't do it sooner.2) Two months later, they announced the next version was coming out, and it turns out the next version is EVEN BETTER.This thing ROCKS!  If you're in the market for a mini-tablet, you should give some serious consideration to going with the Nexus.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Januarie Jaye
Reviews.Content: This tablet was much better than I expected. I love it. It's great for reading and all my social networks.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: bobby
Reviews.Content: I'm so much in love wit this tablets.the picture when I'm streaming movies is crisp.the sound out of this planet.the only concern is it didn't have camera

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Eduardo J. Bracho M.
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and having used it for the last 9 months I can say that there is not a best choice for this price. It's a device designed for google so the integration with other google products is perfect and seamless. It has a 1280 x 800 high-definition display, ideal for gaming, reading and watching movies. Its quad-core processor makes apps run faster and browsing the internet is a delight. Games are very responsive too (I play baseball, soccer and basketball with it).Sound is not that good.Regrettably it has only a front-facing camera. When chatting with family and friends overseas the rear camera is a must!Overall this is a great product for heavy users.

Reviews.Title: So happy with this
Reviews.Author: Samm
Reviews.Content: I'm taking this on all my motorcycle trips. It's perfect for packing, easier for books &music;, & the screen is just the right size. I have even gotten used to the typing interface. Wish I could pop in SD cards from my cameras but otherwise no major complaints. Loading apps is easy.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: usar17
Reviews.Content: Great Tablet. Excellent size. have no complaints at all.Android interface is easy to use. Recommend this to anyone who uses an android phone as the nook/ kindle aren't as easy to use IMO.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: J. Klunk
Reviews.Content: I researched and read all the reviews for smaller tablets, and this one is perfect for my needs. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Debated for a long time, LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I debated between this tablet, another nook tablet, a kindle or an iPad mini for about a month before I decided to jump onto the Nexus 7.  I LOVE it.  I can have all my reading apps and libraries from amazon and barnes and noble on it as well as save from the huge price jump to go to the iPad mini.  I use it constantly for school with a Zagg blue tooth keyboard and wrote an entire 8 page research paper on it last semester.  Much lighter to lug around than a laptop is so my back also thanks me.

Reviews.Title: AAA+++
Reviews.Author: JerryDC
Reviews.Content: I use this tablet for flying.  I t met all my expectations.  With the AVARE app I can download all my charts and plates for free.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7 (7 inch 32GB)Tablet (2012)
Reviews.Author: P. Upchurch
Reviews.Content: The tablet exceeded my expectations except that I couldn't get it to syc with my Mac computer. I even downloaded Mac Android File Transfer but that didn't do the job. Fortunately I have a PC to do my Transfers with. Another way to put stuff onto the Nexus is to email the files to yourself and the download the the files to your your device. My Jpegs and Mp3's are the main thing I bought the Tablet for. The screen resolution could be a little better but that's not that important. I'll  be hanging on to my Nexus for the next few years for sure.

Reviews.Title: Love everything except the battery backup
Reviews.Author: Sasanka Vuyyuru "desi biker"
Reviews.Content: Love absolutely everything about this tablet. It was the perfect size I was looking for.Pros: Hardware, Size, Feel, Stock Android and Sim CapabilityCons: Battery.Not sure if I got a faulty unit or Nexus7 is bad with battery but it dies within 24 hours with either Wifi or 4G turned on.ALso cannot play games for more than a couple of hours.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Charmin Hayes
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love our new ASUS Nexus 7 tablet.  It has provided hours of fun. It's also very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Asus Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: joann b henderson
Reviews.Content: I love the sharp picture, and the fact it is small enough to put in my purse, and that I can play games on it.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd Nexus 7 -- now I, my hubby and Mom all have one. Love this product!  Strongly recommend for user-friendliness, efficiency and convenience.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet!
Reviews.Author: Michelle S.
Reviews.Content: This tablet is awesome!  It does everything I need it to do and then some.  The picture quality is crisp and clean and the processor allows for easy gaming and video streaming.  I would highly recommend this for anyone looking for a smaller tablet and not wanting to break the bank.

Reviews.Title: love!!!  Best tablet on the market!!
Reviews.Author: Holly Jo Parsons
Reviews.Content: The first tablet I owned was a Barnes and Noble Nook and while it was a great tablet it just didn't have all the free apps from the Google Play store like the Nexus 7 does.  It's small and lightweight and has the latest version of Android.  That's one of the great things about the Nexus tablets, since they are google branded they are always updating to the latest versions of Android.

Reviews.Title: asus 7" tablet
Reviews.Author: Fred Soule
Reviews.Content: purchased this for my wife (birthday) and she loves it-finds it easy to use and likes the graphics, and it being so slim.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet.
Reviews.Author: Eliott Mendelson "ele"
Reviews.Content: I own several tablets and only purchased this one as a tool to use in teaching.  It works great.  All that is missing is the mico-sd slot.It would be perfect for all applications if this feature were available.

Reviews.Title: Like my Nexus 7. Recommend it...
Reviews.Author: Carolyn M Adams
Reviews.Content: I like my Nexus 7. My son has one and recommended it to me. He has had his for 1 yr or so. Reads alot. Right price range so I purchased one. I do like it.

Reviews.Title: So good...
Reviews.Author: Xiaodong Chen "book worm"
Reviews.Content: I like it very much! I really can't wait for the Nexus 8 to come out. ASUS Nexus 7 (7-Inch, 32GB) Tablet (2012)

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7 inch tablet
Reviews.Author: Karen Pagel
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the product and overall operation.  It has been easy to operate and understand  functions.  No issues at all.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Cassie Borkoski
Reviews.Content: Its a great tablet for the price. I enjoy using mine, both using it with apps and using the internet.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
Reviews.Author: Working Diva
Reviews.Content: I gave this product as a gift because of the ease of use and excellent features and quality of the ASUS Nexus 7.  LOVE--LOVE it!!!

Reviews.Title: nexus 7
Reviews.Author: Steve Van Dinter
Reviews.Content: I love it its so much faster than a netbook or laptop very compact it fits in your purse. Does everything u need it to do would buy it again. Thank u

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7 is great
Reviews.Author: Fred W
Reviews.Content: I bought a cheap Chinese pad that lasted about 2 months before it stopped working. Instruction manual was not in English, and Chinese characters were popping up, apps were not compatible, despite being Android based. The nexus has been reliable, very fast, updates Android operating system seamlessly, and has a great battery life.

Reviews.Title: very impressed
Reviews.Author: Peter Moore
Reviews.Content: This is my first android device. I have been using apple products up until now but was not prepared to buy the iPad Mini with such a low screen resolution. The nexus 7 is excellent and the Android 4.3 OS works well. I am also able to connect USB devices to the nexus using a micro USB converter. Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Among the Best
Reviews.Author: Shel20284
Reviews.Content: One of the best 7 inch tablet out there. But having one of these might make u become lazy. Watch out

Reviews.Title: Top rated android tablet actually deserves the rating
Reviews.Author: Ronald D. Bascombe
Reviews.Content: I was undecided what I would purchase and, so, I started reading the ratings on the internet. For the buck, this was the best choice and I am happy that I trusted the ratings.

Reviews.Title: Asus Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: forpam
Reviews.Content: Easy to take around in a woman's handbag. I love the additional features provided which are more than a kindle

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the money!
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Bonin "rwbonin"
Reviews.Content: Product has a nice feel to it - not heavy or too big to handle.Version 2 (2013) is now out - appears to be another 5 star tablet.

Reviews.Title: The Perfect Birthday Present
Reviews.Author: Diana Jago
Reviews.Content: This, plus the FINTIE Folio Stand, were a birthday present.  The recipient is very happy with the Nexus, as it was requested as the only present desired.  My order was processed correctly, arrived on time, and was exactly what I ordered.  They could not get better than that.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm.
Reviews.Author: Ernest H Moore
Reviews.Content: The only thing that I would really like to have is a rear facing camera. Other than that it is perfect for what I use it for.

Reviews.Title: Bought this as a gift
Reviews.Author: A. Rhoad
Reviews.Content: So far she seems to love it and it made her introduction into the tablet world easy to navigate. Will provide a more detailed update in time. To compare to a Blackberry Playbook I bought a few years back, the Nexus 7 could easily have it beat (plus you can access a better-abled Android market over the piss-poor RIM market)

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7 tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my Nexus tablet. It is just the right size and fit. The resolution is great. Easy to navigate.I have only one complaint. The battery life needs to be improved. I use my tablet for emails, browsing  the web and reading books. Overall, for the price, it is a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted, I use primarily for educational purposes. Downloading my courses ebooks. Fabulous response no technical issues as yet. Been an owner for alnost 8 months. See the next gen is being unveiled soon but I'll just wait and see.

Reviews.Title: Loving it so far!
Reviews.Author: Lilian Baldassarre
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these in June ... My 5 year old and 7 year old are thrilled to have them.  They have to be reset occasionally as the voice turns off but other than that.. .nothing major to report but it has only been two months.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: grindcorehippie
Reviews.Content: This tablet is outstanding!! It works absolutely flawless. I have only had it for a few days and I am really impressed with its performance! And I chose the first generation over the second, and am glad I made the decision. If this tablet is in your price range, and you don't know what one to get, look no further. This is the best choice by far! I'm even writing my review from it right now :)

Reviews.Title: Love my tablet
Reviews.Author: Dianne Lewis
Reviews.Content: Great price, great tablet.  I cannot live without my nexus 7 now.  It has become part of me.  Absolutely love it.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Tom Garrett Toren
Reviews.Content: It's great.  I've found it easier to use than a laptop.  I'm picking up speed typing using SwiftKey (sensational app).  The recommended case is perfect and protects it well.  I'd recommend spending a bit more for your screen protector.  I went with the one that was included in the "people who ordered this also ordered that" bit and it's merely adequate (get watcha pay for).My only complaint is the camera.  From other reviews I was expecting something a bit more versatile and user friendly.  Oh well, can't have everything.

Reviews.Title: excellent device
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: 32 GB of storage, vanilla android 4.3, and only $199.00 when I bought mine. There is nothing else that compares to this in my opinion. I love it and am ordering several more to give out as gifts.

Reviews.Title: Really good tablet
Reviews.Author: Anthony Verdesca
Reviews.Content: It is comfortable to use, it's light and very useful tottaly recommended if you're thinking to buy it ! !

Reviews.Title: A nice tablet
Reviews.Author: James Pierce
Reviews.Content: I bought the 7 to see if I would like it for reading vs buying paperback.  I guess I am old school, I didn't care for it and ended up selling it to someone.  Thats not to say it wasn't a nice unit, it just wasn't for me.

Reviews.Title: like my tablet
Reviews.Author: slimpc "slimpc"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a tablet for multiple purposes. It came down to the Samsung tab 2 and the HP7. Then I saw the google nexus 7 on sale and looked at it again. The one I got had 32gb and the newer jellybean 3.2 (Tab 2 had an older OS.). Mine has since been upgraded to the newest 3.2. It does everything well.  I would give it 4&1/2 * if I could instead of 5* because of 2 deficits.  1. It has only a front camera and no rear camera. If you want a tablet that you can carry about and take pictures with, this is not for you. 2. I read some journals that have Ipad apps but no Android Apps. I can still read them with the Nexus (off the internet), but it would be better if they had Android Apps, or presently on an Ipad.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: Maritza Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and light weight.  Its email feature is really great!  It is a powerful tool to get things done when you are not at your desk...

Reviews.Title: I love my tablet....
Reviews.Author: Katherine Hache Nadal
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet, i Received on time, this product is amazing, you can see movies, videos, etc by your HDMI Cable. You have to buy the Google Nexus 7 Tablet Micro USB to connect to the TV.

Reviews.Title: IN LOVE
Reviews.Author: Diablo
Reviews.Content: i have now bought two, one for me and one for my wife.  Honestly best tablet on the market, for the fairest price.  I was considering a IPad, but the screen resolution is less than this Nexus, it cost more, the processor is slower, and it cost more....  I HIGHLY recommend this product, especially if your not looking to just buy something because of a brand name.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: Ike
Reviews.Content: I got it thinking it would be a great experience, so far it has been, mostly after the android 4.3 launch.Very much recommended for the Android enthusiasts.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad tablet, especially for the price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am not a tech guru, just an average person so take my review for what its worth.  This is a very good tablet!  We have an I-pad which is awesome.  Bought this one because of the price and wanted a second tablet..  The Asus was recommended to me by a friend who fanatically researches everything before she buys.  I read several reviews (CNet to be specific) and it was highly rated even rated higher than the I-pad mini).  The size is perfect, the screen is responsive and it is as fast as the wi-fi being used.  You can buy a newer model but for the average joe, this is perfect for surfing the web, streaming video and checking e-mail.  Has a good battery life.  My 5 year old watches video and is constantly changing apps.  The battery usually lasts approximately 6-7 hours with battery draining use (streaming video/games).  It appears solid and sturdy (same 5 year old has butterfingers).  For the money, I recommend this as a "best buy"!

Reviews.Title: Check your apps!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Hooper
Reviews.Content: My Nexus tablet has been great for reading, surfing, and taking notes, but beware its limitations.  The front-facing camera is very hard to use with bar code readers, place or facial recognition apps, or just taking pictures without your face in them.Less obvious, but more frustrating: the headphone jack does not support a microphone, so you can't use the Square Register app to take credit-card payments. See: [...]I'll continue to use my Nexus 7, but will squint harder at the specs before I buy another tablet!

Reviews.Title: its great
Reviews.Author: Eric Otero
Reviews.Content: I brought the tablet to my wife and she love it.She like the speed of the tablet and the space that have to storage.

Reviews.Title: I love my new tablet
Reviews.Author: Marta Kisilevsky
Reviews.Content: It is as pretty as I saw it in the web. It is a very confortable size and the screen is very good. I recommend it. The relationship between cost and quality is excelent.

Reviews.Title: expectations met
Reviews.Author: Charles Mcgonigal "CARLO"
Reviews.Content: This is  a quality tablet. I have had 3 other tablets previously and this is superior to those. Right price , right size. Now my nephew wants one.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: This tablet is awesome! Have not cone across anything it can not do yet. Great for kids to work on homework and play games. I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Tablet
Reviews.Author: David Brown
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for a starter price. Graphics is stunning and the battery is excellent. This is a must for starters.

Reviews.Title: Avoid this.
Reviews.Author: Treat
Reviews.Content: This device has only a front camera.  It has no slot for memory expansion, unlike the 16GB version.  The speaker works when it feels like it.  The touchscreen works 85% of the time with about the same accuracy.The battery lasts for about 7 hours of use, so that's great.Had I known the improved Nexus 7 that fixes all of these issues was coming out, I would not have wasted the money on this one.As it is, it can not be returned.  (That may depend on the seller.  I will not do business with the company that fulfilled my order again.)I have no idea what is supposed to make the Nexus 7 so much better than the MemoPad which can be bought for 1/2 the price.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Wail Baoween
Reviews.Content: Ok, it was a little bit smaller than what I thought – I got it as a gift so I didn’t check it before. However, I just love how reliable this tablet is. Android is running very smoothly and everything works perfectly. I had Asus Transformer before and it was nice, but definitely this is much better in terms of how the programs are stable with no crashing or bugs here and there.Bad things, as I said it is a little bit small so if you are used to iPad mini you will not like it at the beginning. Also it is somehow thick compared to Asus Transformer for example. You need to charge it almost daily while I used to charge my Asus Transformer every three days. But really, non if these is a problem, I really love it!

Reviews.Title: I like this tablet very much
Reviews.Author: M.A. Norton
Reviews.Content: The tablet easy to use and fast only issue I have is where on/off button is as in my case cannot get to easy it should be on top of bottom by charger in my opinion

Reviews.Title: Bday gift
Reviews.Author: Freddie
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift. I was debating between this and the kindle fire. Heard mixed reviews, but it is everything and more than expected. Shipping was prompt and no issues. Great tablet especially for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great device, perfect tablet execution
Reviews.Author: Heisenberg Blue
Reviews.Content: Asus and Google truly created a masterpiece with the Nexus 7. The Tegra 3 processor works very well for games, unlike my other tablets it does not lag whatsoever even in the most graphic intense games. The graphic quality is amazing and much better than most others.  My Note 2 processor may be a bit faster but in games the quality and optimizations are superior due to it having NVIDIA in the mix, NVIDIA has the best hardware\software combo.The body is great! It's a lot lighter than any other I've used which is really important when you're holding it for hours reading, etc...Taking pictures with a tablet is a bit foolish however, the front camera is perfect for Skype and such. The back is made of a tough material which can withstand a lot of punishment, it won't be damaged or scratched. You won't have to put up with ugly scratches which are usually apparent on tablets made just to look nice.I've put it down without a case on many different surfaces and there isn't a scratch on it.The seller I received mine from gave me one that looked brand new.The Pros:-Very light and thin-Bare tablet that's just a tablet without unnecessary add ons which barely work and just creates bulk.-Materials are tough and allows you to just drop it anywhere without worrying.-Hardware is great, gives the performance you want and the battery life you can only dream of. With the passive 5th core, it consumes very little power while still running all your background apps.-Very cost efficient for what it is, affordable new technology.-From Google, full access to all software-Very easy to hold and fun for playing games/watching movies.-Can be easily rooted which is one of the most important features.-Future proof with the ability to sync with smart tvs allowing you to display your screen on a tv.Cons:-No microsd slot, however with an Otg cable you have an USB slot available for flash drives and game controllers to be used.-Extra unused space could've been used to make the screen bigger or the unit smaller.-Speakers are in the back which defeat the purpose, also not very loud.-Wifi doesn't have the best range I've seen but definitely not bad either.-Requires extra hardware just to add some much needed memory and port.Overall for a tablet it has just the right amount of space for apps, books and a couple games. Light weight and easy to hold, let's you have it in your hands all day. You won't want to put it down. It's a simple tablet that's just a tablet, perfect for doing what you need to do with a tablet. It looks and feels like it'll last for a very long time. It'll satisfy your needs for years to come, for its intended use I don't ever see the need for it to be replaced.

Reviews.Title: i love the Nexus7
Reviews.Author: Mildred
Reviews.Content: This is a great small take anywhere tablet. I can read books and do everything I'd normally do on my laptop. It's fast with any delays and I'm extremely happy I bought the Nexus7 instead of any of the others that are on the market right now.

Reviews.Title: The best bang for your buck in the $199 price range.
Reviews.Author: Jaymes
Reviews.Content: Considered the Nexus 7 over the Galaxy tab 3 and I love it. Clean high definition screen, super responsive, and easy to use. The only draw back is the lack of a memory card expansion slot, but there are ways around that (USB connection/cloud storage). I highly recommend this tablet...more than capable!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet
Reviews.Author: DC Guaro
Reviews.Content: This device delivers an extraordinary performance and high quality product for a significant low price,  when compared to other tablets. I own devices from many manufacturers, but the Nexus 7 is one of those (along with my iPhone)  that I cannot go out without.The hardware is fantastic. I love the "leathered" back of the case, which makes it very easy to grab it without concerns of losing your grip. Image and screen are beautiful. Software is practical and fast.I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: rebecca heyne
Reviews.Content: All my laptops are Apple products but I wanted a simple tablet for a fair price and this fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Adam Rynczak
Reviews.Content: Fast and easy to use. Got my tech-avoidant dad to start using one for father's day and he uses it daily!

Reviews.Title: My first tablet
Reviews.Author: Bickerald McSwarvey
Reviews.Content: I'm happy to have this new tablet.  It does all that I wish.  Living abroad, I was hoping to use my smartphone without 3G service as an internet device, and have access to all my android apps.  That didn't work.  But I am able to do that with the Nexus.  Great screen ratio for watching shows and movies, and I love google now, even though it's slightly big brother-ish.

Reviews.Title: excellent product! i love it
Reviews.Author: karla vargas
Reviews.Content: I recomend this product because its all that i wanted, and the price is low comparing another 7 inch tablets. It really works for me

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Vicky Garcia
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for the price, fast and works as expected, want one more for the family, maybe will get the 10 next time

Reviews.Title: One Word...Incredible!
Reviews.Author: jDiver
Reviews.Content: I use the Nexus for work.  I can keep my entire office on this thing and still have room for my toys and media.  The Nexus 7 keeps all of my marketing presentations, PowerPoints, email, and everything else I need to get the job done.Even with my entire office on my tablet, I still have room for my music, movies, books, magazines, and favorite android applications.Battery life is amazing!  Since I travel a lot for work, and not near a outlet all the time, the battery life was a key feature for me and the Nexus delivers for me.  Even with heavy use and playing music in the car, the battery will last 3 days with out a second of recharge!The only downside of the tablet were the fact that there is no slot to allow you to expand the memory with a memory card.  It also needs Wi-Fi so you will need a hot spot to access the internet.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, much better than my expectation.
Reviews.Author: freebsd4ever
Reviews.Content: I have an ipad2, but still I bought this Nexus 7. The main reason is that it is titled by "Google". Lots of Google applications and third-party programs. The price of Nexus 7 beats all tablets.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Cristina
Reviews.Content: I simply loved it! It is easy to use and carry.I would sure recommend it to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Murad Halasah
Reviews.Content: Well I purchased this item and they sent it to me the next day and I recommend to buy from this dealer.

Reviews.Title: I received a Black one. I love it.
Reviews.Author: cowsenior
Reviews.Content: I love the size of this Google Nexus 7. Comparing with iPad mini, Nexus 7 is a little bit heavier. But iPad mini will make you feel more comfortable to hold it for more than 30 minutes.Hope Google will make a lightest one in the market.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my wife after a ten inch tablet failed after only a few weeks. My wife loves this tablet and it has been rock solid. Even though it is a smaller format, it is very easy to read and manipulate. It is very responsive to a light touch. The speed is excellent. If it passes my wife's scrutiny, it is a good product. Well done ASUS.

Reviews.Title: the best performance/price ratio
Reviews.Author: Louis
Reviews.Content: Don't pay MORE for the Apple logo!!!!Or be stupid.The Nexus 7 tablet delivers good performance and flexibility at an unbeatable price.

Reviews.Title: Must-buy !
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: That pretty much says it all. It's not the technology, it's Google-on-the-go that you're buying. Have started using it for 2 weeks now. Smooth scrolling and swiping. Super-fast app download, 3x faster than my iPhone with the same wi-fi connection.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: John B Livingston
Reviews.Content: Best tablet for the money ever, runs all the things quickly and I have yet to see any lag on it

Reviews.Author: tigerina
Reviews.Content: Enjoy several hours of researching on the net, apps/media, email, shopping... Incapable of running online active content educational math games currently. Maybe will spend a little time seeing if there is an app for that. Overall pretty spiffy

Reviews.Title: Nice, just as i remembered them
Reviews.Author: DerrickHawkins
Reviews.Content: Well done. The included micro-usb charging/data cable doesn't work with the unit but luckily i have a phone with a micro-usb port that works.

Reviews.Title: great!!!
Reviews.Author: NicefitSports
Reviews.Content: ASUS Nexus ASUS-1B32 7-Inch 32GB Tablet (Brown)Very great, like it so much,,good tablemy family trust it,quite good...thanks so much again,

Reviews.Title: Nexus Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My bf bought this for me for my birthday and it is perfect for school, I can read the teachers powerpoint and make notes. Simple to use, maybe because I have the nexus phone so it is practically them same.

Reviews.Title: smooth and faster
Reviews.Author: FLAVIO S NAZARIO
Reviews.Content: Is very resistant to tough impact and well designed, I am impressed with the battery too.The only problem is the wifi signal, is very poor for medium distances.

Reviews.Title: useful, quick, and yes, it's fun
Reviews.Author: R. Workman "Grizzrob"
Reviews.Content: I'll add my recommendation to this device.  Comparing it to our iPad, Kindle, and iPhones - it really stands apart.  The iPad beats it on the display, but the tradeoff is the size.  I've gotten to where I would rather hold the N7 while I'm reading or checking emails.  The thing really works well on the plane, stays discrete.For performance - hardly any hiccups, I've had a few glitches and reboots required, but no more than my others.Maybe my favorite thing is the swipe to type - it work's very well.  I can go about as fast as I want and it usually picks the right word, and it has changed my idea of the tablet handicap for composing text.The most functional, value added part of this gem is the built in true GPS.  I'll confirm that it works just fine, with no wifi.  I took it across the US and across the UK and found the GPS never had an issue getting a signal. Save your g-map ahead of time, or get a navigation app and you are in business.I'm working into the Google ecosystem for music and media, still prefer amazon and itunes though.Battery charge is good - easily makes it through a day of regular use, or a 6-hour flight of constant email, reading, movies and music.

Reviews.Title: The very top of the budget tablet mountain.
Reviews.Author: Moviedude
Reviews.Content: There is good and bad news about the Nexus.First the good: The Nexus is a pretty great tablet. The screen is bright, clear, and sharp; sensitivity is top notch; and although the speakers are small they crank out enough audio that you can watch movies and hear what the actors say. The Nexus has a big beefy CPU and as such can play most Android games and play movies with nary a stutter. And it runs the latest flavor of Android, making top of the line web browsing and all the newest features of the OS available to you. Compared to where the 200-ish tablet market was a couple years ago, the Nexus is a huge leap forward and can compete favorably with other, far more expensive tablets.The bad: Asus had to trim a lot of fat to make such a good tablet so cheap. There is no HDMI out for watching movies on your TV, there is no rear camera and the front camera is only really suitable for video chat, and there is no micro-SD slot, so you must make do with on-board storage or network storage of some kind. None of these are dealbreakers, but it is disappointing that these features, which are available on many cheaper tablets, are absent here. That said, I don't use these features, I didn't miss them, and the Nexus is great otherwise.There are two extra features the Nexus DOES have that bear mention: it has pogo pins so you can sit it in a charging dock for fast charging with no plugin, and it has a magnetic switch that puts it to sleep when you close a magnetic case (sold separately by assorted makers).Overall, the Nexus is a top-tier tablet offering an unparallelled Android experience, but you will need to go further up market for higher grade features. If you don't need them then this is your best bet bar none.UPDATESeveral months down the line we are continuing to love the Nexus. It has great audio for watching a show on the couch with our older son, the screen looks great, and it starts cleanly and quickly. I can't speak to battery life because we use it very heavily- it is now an alarm clock in addition to its other duties as a television, facebook portal, and gaming handheld- and it is almost always on. One thing I have noticed- and this is true for ALL Android devices- is that if you have a lot of apps that run while the tablet is asleep it charges very slowly. The real test of charge speed is with the tablet totally off, in which case it charges very quickly. It also installs system updates very quickly, as we recently found out.Still totally pleased as punch with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Loving it
Reviews.Author: jayashankar
Reviews.Content: Thank you to the seller for a quick delivery.Took some time to verify the device and its working awesome.Loving it and slowly migrating from PC to Tablet for daily use.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Yam
Reviews.Content: amazing android tablet that works smoothly with a great screen and performanceand of course for a very good price

Reviews.Title: Like a Mini Laptop
Reviews.Author: Iris E. Gonzalo-Sowle
Reviews.Content: It is preloaded with alot of apps. Apps that my husband use all the time. It is easy to carry around. This is a gift that my husband wanted.

Reviews.Title: UNREAL!
Reviews.Author: alf
Reviews.Content: im 52 my electronics was PONG! this thing does everything but make a sandwich and if it doesent it will tell you how to. great  buy it!

Reviews.Title: Wonderfull
Reviews.Author: Alberto Cortes
Reviews.Content: It's just the best table I could buy (7" I mean). Nexus works perfectly, Battery dure alot. Tablet responses great.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7
Reviews.Author: Maxun
Reviews.Content: I will think this is the best tablet I own, for travel is amaising and the size is perfect, will work with so many app is unbelievable and is nice looking too.

Reviews.Title: Nice Table for the money
Reviews.Author: Rodney
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet for the money.  Fits easily in wifes purse.  So far so good, but only had the unit for a few weeks.  Easy to set up, and appears to have good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what i wanted!
Reviews.Author: Dawn M. Brame
Reviews.Content: My laptop died so I needed and inexpensive option that would give me more mobility options. Since I don't have a main computer the only draw back in the limits add far as writing and editing documents, but I'll probably get a blue tooth keyboard when I need to type more. Also I wish I had known about the nexus 4 since it can be used as a tablet device or added to a phone plan as smartphone which would have been a great option for me. But I am pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nexus7
Reviews.Author: Arlea M. Oliveira
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet Nexus7 unfortunately I had to return this because it came defective. So I got my money back I bought another Nexus7.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet
Reviews.Author: El Malo
Reviews.Content: The Asus Nexus 7 tablet is an excellent tablet.  Its small size and weight makes it very portable to have it with you anytime.  I like it and I'm very happy with the purchase of it.  I highly recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 7  exceed ed my expectations.
Reviews.Author: robbie8704
Reviews.Content: I'm a person of few words. The Nexus 7 is awesome. I no longer lug my laptop around, it's been put in  archives. Thank you for a portable handheld computer.

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Nse Ette
Reviews.Content: I got the Nexus 7 for 4 main reasons:1. It charges by USB when connected to a laptop or PC.2. I can drag and drop all files (photos, music, etc) onto it withoutthe need to sync.3. No restriction on movie formats it can play, so no need to convert movie files.4. I can connect my flash drive or external drive to it. For this, you need an OTG cable and an app like Nexus Media Importer.Screen resolution is quite good, though not as sharp as the iPhone's or iPad's. However, the processor must be superior to the iPhone's or iPad's because downloads are much faster. I've downloaded magazines I subscribe to on these devices and the Nexus completes this twice as fast.Battery life is about 9 hours of regular use, about half if playing games or watching movies. For the rather cheap price, quality is very good. Build is nice and solid with a dimpled plastic back. There's no rear camera, just a 1.2MP front facing one, but I'm fine with that as I always find it silly when I see people using tablets to take photos anyway. You can geotag photos by downloading an app like GeoTag Android's buddy which is free. It's also got Bluetooth, NFC, an accelerometer, and a gyroscope.For those with a google account, it imports your address book, emails, Chrome bookmarks, etc.This is the tablet I have been waiting for.

Reviews.Title: totally love it
Reviews.Author: Crisoforo Lopez Cruz
Reviews.Content: I am in love of this tablet, it rarely slowdown compare to other tablets I have had before, probably the only down side is the no camera in the back otherwise is the perfect tablet.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: edgar d.
Reviews.Content: Not excited about the mandatory wifi for start up.  i had to run a pirate signal just to turn it on.  there is no wifi on Navy ships out at sea.  Easy to use with both PC and Mac (I use both)  Perfect size for active lifestyle.  It holds tons of media.  I like it

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Sunlightstudio
Reviews.Content: The Nexus 7 is fast, easy to use, easy to read.  It has become a great addition to enable me to have access to files, documents, etc. on the go!

Reviews.Title: First tablet and first android product.
Reviews.Author: Boozoomoo
Reviews.Content: This tablet is excellent! It's fast, sleek, and powerful. The myriad of apps available on the android market and the smoothness of this tablet makes me want to take it everywhere! With a MoKo Slim-fit Case for Google Nexus 7, it looks kind of like a small Bible which I'm used to carrying around anyway. With the Bible app, I don't even have to bring my leather Bible anywhere.I love sitting down, reading, browsing, listening to music, and playing games with it. I have notebook apps for school, planners, calendars, and more. I considered buying an Ipad mini because I don't want to carry large devices (might as well carry a laptop), but when I looked at comparison videos I saw that the Ipad mini couldn't really be carried with one hand like this baby can. This feels really great in the hand and once again, it looks great! It looks like I'm carrying around a small book and can even fit in big jeans pockets or pretty much any jacket pocket. For ladies, it easily fits into any size purse. It also beats the Ipad mini in price by about $100. It even beats the price of most smart phones! I haven't tried it yet, but I heard you can even use it as a phone, albeit a big phone. The stereo quality isn't very good compared to the speakers I have hooked up to my laptop (Insignia NS-PLTPSP2 2 Piece Speaker System), but that's to be expected.Pretty much my only complaint of this device is the lack of a back facing camera. That means, if I want to take a picture of something I have to turn it around and look at it from the side... which is kind of awkward. Still, most people have smart phones or actual cameras for pictures so it wasn't really a deal breaker for me.Anyway, this is a great product and I am one satisfied customer!

Reviews.Title: My go to tablet now
Reviews.Author: F. Ong
Reviews.Content: this tablet is my go-to tablet now. It's size is perfect for anywhere reading, browsing, playing. It's pretty speedy and the colors are good - not oversaturated like Samsung's, not muddy like some others. It is missing a 5G wifi radio but it's a fast enough connection otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size and works perfect
Reviews.Author: John Jo
Reviews.Content: I received and instantly was updated and loaded with all my personal stuff since I entered my Google Account. Recevied all the information from my Galaxy S3. After three days it stopped working but amazon customer service told me how to reset it. Push the bottom 20 seconds..no less than that. I give 4 stars because it works perfect but vendor must response to all the claims posted with a simple solution like the one provided to me by Amazon customer service

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Jorge Luis Castellanos Díaz
Reviews.Content: I was owner of one samsung 7'' tablet and I can say that beside this one doesn't have dual camera is too much faster than the Samsung one

Reviews.Title: my first tablet i really enjoying it
Reviews.Author: kelvin
Reviews.Content: really enjoying my tablet my first one its great i recommend it to anyone looking for a tablet great tablet

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Jack Klintworth
Reviews.Content: It does eveything I expected it to do and I'm constantly learning new things that it does. Many interesting apps available.

Reviews.Title: Replaced my laptop
Reviews.Author: Lincoln Osiris
Reviews.Content: The Nexus 7 is easily the best buy that I've made in a while. I sold my super old laptop and bought the Nexus 7 to replace it. It does everything my laptop could do including word processing (office suite pro), image editing (sketch book mobile), and of course torrenting (tTorrent). The only thing its missing is the DVD drive... But who uses DVDs anymore? The battery life is exceptional. the weight is noticeable but justified, its a lot faster than other tablets in the 7" class for a better price and its about 1/4 the weight of my laptop. Hard to go wrong with this device.

Reviews.Title: For the price it can't be beat
Reviews.Author: J. Vazquez
Reviews.Content: I've been a big Google/Android fan for some time now. I bought the G1 (the first Android phone), the Samsung Vibrant (T-Mobile version of the Galaxy S1 line), and the Galaxy Nexus. I love the Galaxy Nexus. It's a very cool phone, it runs Android 4.2, but it has horrible battery life. I can drain it from 100% to 75% in less than an hour. So, I can't use my phone as much as I would like to when I'm out of the house or away from my computer.
